name: Rolling Pandas Leaves No Snow Behind
name_original: Rolling Pandas Leaves No Snow Behind
description:
Welcome to the Panda downhill races. They are training all year long, rolling hitting rocks, eating bamboo, popping bamboo all over and just can’t stop being happy. It’s the bamboo right. This year we are recording this event for the first time, and our main player panda is named John. He has trained all year long and he is ready to be the winner of this race. The race is held on Qin Mountain in January 2021.

Made by WJT - NOVA,  OCTOBRE, ALOJIRAE, LIMA, KENNOBIBEN. Weekly Jam 204
